description: Alterations and extension to roof to form end gable; rear dormer with Juliette balcony; three rooflights in front roof slope; front porch; external alterations (demolition of front porch)
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
auto;mso-add-space:auto;text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:Arial;mso-ansi-language:EN-US">1.<span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-kerning: auto; font-optical-sizing: auto; font-feature-settings: normal; font-variation-settings: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">The single storey front extension</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">, by reason of </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">its design, width and height </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">form</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">s</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"> an
incongruous</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">,</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"> discordant
and dominant addition to the host dwelling. The&nbsp;
development </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">is therefore</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"> contrary to the high quality design
aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3.D(1)
and D3.D(11) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core
Strategy (2012), Policy DM1</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">of the Harrow Development Management
Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document:
Residential Design Guide (2010).<o:p></o:p></span></p>
